channel.title: Projects on The Rematriation Project
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on The Rematriation Project

item.description: Between June 1, 2022 and June 30, 2023, the team coordinated the digitization of the Caleb Pungowiyi collection. With the generous aid of the Virginia Tech Digitization Lab, the team digitized a wide range of physical materials, from photographs to personal journals. The digitization process of Caleb Pungowiyiâ€™s materials resulted in about 200 hours of work, which included 554 slides cataloged/digitized; 1,636 photos cataloged/digitized; and 94 journals and documents cataloged/digitized.

The team has created a prototype collection with a installation. This prototype provides us with a convenient initial data model for our work that can be scaled by Aqqaluk Trust and others to meet future and broader rematriation needs.

Check out the prototype!
